title: Remove previously uploaded portfolio videos

requirements.text: Remove any previously uploaded/older portfolio video embeds so that the Portfolio section only includes the user-provided video links (and does not include the prior placeholder/older video embed). Specifically, remove the existing embed URL `https://www.youtube.com/embed/dQw4w9WgXcQ` from the portfolio data so it no longer appears in the grid and cannot be opened in the preview dialog.

quotes: and remove previous videos uploaded before

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/portfolio/portfolioData.ts` no longer contains the video embed URL `https://www.youtube.com/embed/dQw4w9WgXcQ`.
The Portfolio grid and preview dialog no longer show/play any video other than the user-provided links already added to the portfolio (YouTube Shorts/Instagram Reel URLs previously provided).
No changes are required to backend canisters; the update is implemented entirely in the frontend data/content.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend immutable paths: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or anything in `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Maintain the existing portfolio categories and UI behavior (grid layout, video indicator, preview dialog) while only removing older video entries.
nonGoals: Adding new videos beyond the user-provided links.
Implementing a backend-driven CMS or upload flow for portfolio videos.
Changing the overall visual theme or section ordering.
